channel.title: Max 90 Lvr on Loans101
channel.description: Recent content in Max 90 Lvr on Loans101

item.title: Suncorp Bank to Basic Loan
item.description: 1. Features [ ] Offset Account [x] Redraw Facility [x] Allow Extra Repayment [x] Allow Loan Increase [x] Split Loans 2. Upfront Fees This is a fee that may be payable by the borrower to a lender prior to or at the application stage, of the lending process. An example of an upfront fee maybe an Application fee (while some may charge upfront, most do not), or Valuation fee (some lenders may charge, while others will cover this cost)

item.title: NAB Choice Package Tailored 2 Years Fixed
item.description: 1. Features [ ] Offset Account [ ] Redraw Facility [ ] Allow Extra Repayment [ ] Allow Loan Increase [x] Split Loans [x] Interest In Advance 2. Upfront Fees This is a fee that may be payable by the borrower to a lender prior to or at the application stage, of the lending process. An example of an upfront fee maybe an Application fee (while some may charge upfront, most do not), or Valuation fee (some lenders may charge, while others will cover this cost)
